public class DataRadioButtons
extends RadioButtonPanel
implements Storable

A database connected group of radio buttons.

DataRadioButtons

public DataRadioButtons(SessionData sessionData,
                        DataObject dO,
                        java.lang.String columnName,
                        int[] keys,
                        java.lang.String[] meaning)
Constructs a new group of radio buttons.

Parameters:
dO - the data object to assign to
columnName - the name of the column the text field is to assign to
keys - the valid keys to be stored in the assigned table
meaning - the meaning of the keys to be displayed as check text

setRequired

public void setRequired(boolean required)
Determines whether input is required (mandatory).

Specified by:
setRequired in interface Storable
Parameters:
required - if true, input is mandatory; otherwise, input is not mandatory

selectAll

public void selectAll()
Selects all input of the component, if it is supported - e.g. in JTextField. Allows easy new input, because the previous value is reset when the first key stroke occurs.

Specified by:
selectAll in interface RemoteContent
Overrides:
selectAll in class RadioButtonPanel
